```{r}

dta_311 <- read_csv(here("data/311.csv"))

```


```{r}

dta_311_clean <- dta_311 %>%
  mutate(
    geoid_bl = stringr::str_pad(`Block Code`, 15, side = "left", pad = "0")
  ) %>%
  select(geoid_bl, everything())
```
